info.name: Simple Gradient Tumblr Dashboard Theme (10 colors)
info.description: This simple dash theme comes in 10 different color palettes straight from Colourlovers most loved palettes of all time, and features 2 different tumblr logos to choose from. The text color palette for this theme is in white/greyscale and if you want to customize it but don't know how, or want anything else about this theme changed to your tastes, message me @eatyourheirs for personalized assistance. Check out the gradient links in additional info!
info.additionalInfo: Screencap features my Minimal Pattern Tumblr Post Icons that are not included in the theme. Default gradient is (◕〝◕). Others are (in order): Giant Goldfish, cheer up emo kid, let them eat cake, clairedelune, LoversInJapan, Adrift in Dreams, mellon ball surprise, Terra?, and i demand a pancake. 11/12 - Changed the logos slightly so that they're more visible/darker. 1/8 - Fixed theme for the new next page buttons. 4/18 - Updated for tumblr's new logo. 11/12 - Realignment, small code tweaks. 1/20 - Code formatting updates.

options.label: cheer up emo kid by electrikmonk
